title: Assam's Himanta Sarma's Controversial "Father-Son" Barb At Rahul Gandhi - NDTV
content: Assam's Himanta Sarma's Controversial "Father-Son" Barb At Rahul Gandhi  NDTVView Full coverage on Google News
description: Assam Chief Minister Himanta Biswa Sarma, hitting out at Rahul Gandhi for raising questions on the 2016 surgical strikes, made a series of controversial comments on the Congress leader at an election rally in Uttarakhand today.
